about_the_game:
Imagine being confined to your bed by sleep paralysis, unable to move, while something keeps you company in the darkness of your room on a stormy, rainy night. Your only hope is to survive until dawn, using your wits to overcome fear and stay calm. But here comes the real challenge: every blink counts. Can you maintain your sanity and survive until daylight dispels the night terrors?

Welcome to Bonanit, a 100% random game where no two playthroughs are the same. Each night brings new horrors, and every moment of sleep paralysis tests your mental resilience. The sinister atmosphere intensifies with every whisper in the dark, where each decision could be your last.






In "Bona nit," experience the paralyzing reality of sleep paralysis. Imagine being trapped in your bed, unable to move, while sensing a sinister presence lurking in the darkness of your room. Every sound, every shadow, and every whisper will make you question your sanity. Can you survive until dawn?




You will never know what to expect in "Bona nit." Each game is a unique experience, with randomly generated horrors ensuring that every night is different from the last. This unpredictability keeps you constantly on edge, never knowing what terror awaits around the corner.




"Bona nit" not only tests your survival skills but also your mental strength. Face your worst fears while trying to stay calm in sleep paralysis situations. Every blink and every decision are crucial. Do you have what it takes to keep your sanity amidst the chaos?




Immerse yourself in a terrifying environment with a raging storm outside and chilling whispers filling the darkness of your room. Sound and shadows combine to create an atmosphere so realistic that you will feel the terror in every fiber of your being. In "Bona nit," every moment could be your last.




The real test comes at the end of each night. Your goal is simple: survive until dawn. But with a malevolent entity lurking, every second feels eternal. Only the bravest and mentally strongest will survive the longest night of their lives. Are you ready to face the unknown and test your endurance?

content_descriptors.notes: Customers should know that our game contains scenes of violence, horror, scares, and murder. There is no sexual content present in the game. However, due to the nature of the content, the game presents intense and terrifying situations that may include representations of explicit violence and murder. Players should be aware that these elements are designed to create an atmosphere of horror and tension. We recommend this game only for those who are comfortable with this type of content.
